amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 to require the U.S. Forest Service to conduct an evaluation of the container aerial firefighting system (CAFFS) to assess the use of such a system to mitigate and suppress wildfires.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Valadao amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Valadao amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent. Pursuant to H.Res. 1486, amendment numbered 3 printed in Part D of House Report 118-705 was modified to add at the end of Title III the following: Sec. 307 Container Aerial Firefighting System (CAFFS).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Valadao amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
